name: Project Equinox Demo
description:
Thousands of years in the future, strange things are afoot. It’s snowing on the equator, animals are migrating out of season, and a man claims he saw a bird flying backwards! As the years pass, this trend only continues, and soon, the entire world is on high alert. A constant string of disasters has been pummeling the globe for a century now, and scientists all over the world are frantically trying to explain it.

In the midst of this mess, comes a dramatic reveal—the existence of magic. Now, a combined team of scientists and mages are working together to find a way to prevent the end of the world, but they’re running out of time. In just a few years, the sun will go dark, and all life as we know it will end.

Their solution? Time travel.

You and other teams of highly trained specialists will travel back in time to a point where you can find out what’s going on, and stop it. Good luck, brave adventurers, you’ll need it. The fate of the world’s future is riding on you.

And the sun went out…

Controls:

Enter: bring up message (if available)

Q: open sidebar menu to view/use items, look at party members, and check quests.

Arrow keys: Move
